Articles.Content:
Presenting... The OldWood MechJeb!

Uses Wacky Wood Wares (kerbalspaceprogram.net), MechJeb (a bunch of places), and my CapacitX Lite tank. For 0.14. 

(I can\'t figure out how to get it to work in 0.15 >![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif))

Won\'t crash (hopefully).
EDIT: I\'m stupid, I should\'ve looked.

No, this is the right forum. This is a ship, not a mod.

EDIT: at least, not a mod of MechJeb. It\'s just a ship with a .cfg-mod tank that happens to use MechJeb, so no permissions needed.

> 
> also, is it 1.8.2 or 1.8.1?

I\'m using 1.8.1.

Oh, my bad, I thought he meant that he changed a wacky wares into a mechjeb.

Sorry!
